verbs.description: Trump and Kim [V: are] expected to attend a historic summit Tuesday in Singapore — the first time a sitting U.S. president will meet with a North Korean leader .
Trump and Kim are [V: expected] [ARG1: to attend a historic summit Tuesday in Singapore — the first time a sitting U.S. president will meet with a North Korean leader] .

[ARG0: Trump and Kim] are expected to [V: attend] [ARG1: a historic summit] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] — [ARGM-ADV: the first time a sitting U.S. president will meet with a North Korean leader] .
Trump and Kim are expected to attend a historic summit Tuesday in Singapore — the first time a [V: sitting] [ARG1: U.S. president] will meet with a North Korean leader .
Trump and Kim are expected to attend a historic summit Tuesday in Singapore — the first time a sitting U.S. president [V: will] meet with a North Korean leader .

Trump and Kim are expected to attend a historic summit Tuesday in Singapore — [ARGM-TMP: the first time] [ARG0: a sitting U.S. president] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: meet] [ARG1: with a North Korean leader] .
